author: Staff Reporter
text:
10th Round of foot-and-mouth disease vaccination drive for cattle began in Tiruvannamalai district on Tuesday. It was inaugurated by the District Collector A.Gnanasekaran in Su.Andapattu village near here.

The drive aims at vaccinating 7,15,603 cattle heads with the help of 119 teams that are attached to government veterinary dispensaries. The drive will on March 21. It will cover many villages as per schedule. The teams will visit the village and vaccinate the cattle instead of asking the owners to bring the cattle to dispensaries. The free vaccination drive is carried out twice a year.
title: Foot-and-mouth disease vaccination drive begins
